founders.name: Tarek El-Sayed
founders.prior_experience: Product Lead at Swvl (Expansion Team); Senior Ops Manager at Fawry.
founders.founder_market_fit_statement: I managed the daily payouts for 5,000+ captains at Swvl and saw firsthand how 60% of them struggle with cash flow management. I have deep connections within the CBE (Central Bank of Egypt) regulatory sandbox.

key_shipments.item: Signed MOU with local microbus syndicate (2,000 drivers).

problem_definition.problem_statement: Informal transport drivers operate entirely in cash, leaving them with no credit score to access financing for vehicle repairs or fuel.
problem_definition.current_solution: Predatory informal lenders (sharks) or borrowing from family/friends.
problem_definition.gap_analysis: Informal lenders charge 20%+ monthly interest; family borrowing is unreliable and unscalable.

impact_metrics.description: Drivers lose 15% of income to predatory interest; high risk of cash theft.

customer_quotes: I keep my money under the seat because I don't trust banks.
If my engine breaks, I am out of work for 2 weeks because I can't get a loan.
The lender takes half my profit just for giving me cash for gas.

product_and_solution.core_stickiness: Instant micro-credit for fuel disbursed directly to the gas station wallet (no cash handling).
product_and_solution.differentiation: We use alternative credit scoring based on their driving routes (GPS data) rather than bank history.
product_and_solution.defensibility_moat: Proprietary credit scoring algorithm and exclusive partnership with the Transport Syndicate.

market_and_scope.beachhead_market: Microbus drivers in Greater Cairo (Giza & Cairo Governorates).
market_and_scope.market_size_estimate: 120,000 Drivers in Cairo (~$50M annual lending opportunity).
market_and_scope.long_term_vision: Becoming the digital bank for the entire gig-economy workforce in North Africa.
market_and_scope.expansion_strategy: Expand to Tuk-tuks in Alexandria, then enter Morocco/Tunisia.

vision_and_strategy.five_year_vision: To become the 'Nubank' for the informal transport sector in MENA.
vision_and_strategy.primary_risk: Regulatory changes regarding non-banking financial institution (NBFI) licenses in Egypt.
